name: aggregateAssetDownloadTask(with:mediaSelections:assetTitle:assetArtworkData:options:)
desc: Creates a download task to download the asset and media selections.

items.name: let AVAssetDownloadTaskMinimumRequiredMediaBitrateKey: String
items.desc: A key that indicates the minimum bit rate of the variant to download.

items.name: let AVAssetDownloadTaskMinimumRequiredPresentationSizeKey: String
items.desc: A key that indicates the minimum presentation size of the variant to download.

items.name: let AVAssetDownloadTaskMediaSelectionKey: String
items.desc: A key that indicates which media selection to download.

items.name: let AVAssetDownloadTaskMediaSelectionPrefersMultichannelKey: String
items.desc: A key that indicates whether the task downloads media selections with support for multichannel playback, when available.

items.name: let AVAssetDownloadTaskPrefersHDRKey: String
items.desc: A key that indicates whether the task downloads HDR instead of SDR video, when available.

items.name: let AVAssetDownloadTaskPrefersLosslessAudioKey: String
items.desc: A key that indicates whether the task downloads media selections in lossless audio format, when available.

declaration:
func aggregateAssetDownloadTask(with URLAsset: AVURLAsset, 
                mediaSelections: [AVMediaSelection], 
                     assetTitle title: String, 
               assetArtworkData artworkData: Data?, 
                        options: [String : Any]? = nil) -> AVAggregateAssetDownloadTask?
